wikipedia_page.main: John Sutton (28 May 1920 – 13 November 2010) was a Welsh boxer who held the Welsh bantamweight title from 1949 to 1951. His brother, George Sutton, also held a Wales boxing belt and his nephew, George Sutton Jr, contested the British Bantamweight title.

response: George Sutton, Sr (15 September 1922 – December 1995) was a Welsh boxer who held the Welsh flyweight title on two occasions. His brother, Jackie Sutton, also held a Wales boxing belt and his son, George Jr, contested the British Bantamweight title. Sutton's career record was poor, and his few wins tended to coincide with the challenges he made for the Welsh titles.
